name: The Blues Brothers
description: The greatest rock 'n' roll game is about to commence: THE BLUES BROTHERS! Cruise along with Jake and Elwood, those all-time rhythm 'n' blues men in this engrossing platform game - an explosive mix of adventure, comedy and music. Back by popular demand, the Blues Brothers are out to conquer the stage one more time. To an upbeat rhythm you set off across town to retrieve your stolen instruments... but it ain't that easy. You've got to escape from prison, swim through the catacombs, and shoot to the upper heights of the big city before you can start the concert. Get ready to play the blues!
